This document describes the current stable version of Celery (4.3). For development docs, go here.

celery.worker.components¶

Worker-level Bootsteps.

class celery.worker.components.Timer(parent, **kwargs)[소스]¶

Timer bootstep.

create(w)[소스]¶

Create the step.

name = 'celery.worker.components.Timer'¶
on_timer_error(exc)[소스]¶
on_timer_tick(delay)[소스]¶
class celery.worker.components.Hub(w, **kwargs)[소스]¶

Worker starts the event loop.

create(w)[소스]¶

Create the step.

include_if(w)[소스]¶

Return true if bootstep should be included.

You can define this as an optional predicate that decides whether this step should be created.

name = 'celery.worker.components.Hub'¶
requires = (step:celery.worker.components.Timer{()},)¶
start(w)[소스]¶
stop(w)[소스]¶
terminate(w)[소스]¶
class celery.worker.components.Pool(w, autoscale=None, **kwargs)[소스]¶

Bootstep managing the worker pool.

Describes how to initialize the worker pool, and starts and stops the pool during worker start-up/shutdown.

Adds attributes:

  • autoscale
  • pool
  • max_concurrency
  • min_concurrency
close(w)[소스]¶
create(w)[소스]¶

Create the step.

info(w)[소스]¶
name = 'celery.worker.components.Pool'¶
register_with_event_loop(w, hub)[소스]¶
requires = (step:celery.worker.components.Hub{(step:celery.worker.components.Timer{()},)},)¶
terminate(w)[소스]¶
class celery.worker.components.Beat(w, beat=False, **kwargs)[소스]¶

Step used to embed a beat process.

Enabled when the beat argument is set.

conditional = True¶

Create the step.
